item.title: Defiant Trump and officials vow to stay course as countries scramble over tariffs
item.description: The US commerce secretary says a 10% "baseline" tariff on imports will definitely stay in place for weeks.

item.title: Second child dies of measles as Texas outbreak worsens
item.description: Health Secretary Robert F Kennedy Jr is reportedly headed to the state, which has recorded 480 cases.

item.title: US cancels visas for South Sudanese over deportation dispute
item.description: The African nation is "taking advantage" of the US by not accepting its citizens, says the top US diplomat.

item.title: A Minecraft Movie storms box office despite lukewarm reviews
item.description: The film boasts a star-studded cast including Jason Momoa, Jack Black and Jennifer Coolidge.

item.title: Moment parachutist left dangling on stadium roof
item.description: Video shows the moment a parachutist got caught on the roof of a stadium ahead of a rugby match.
